name: nach0-attach-notes
title: Attach Notes - patch for SE and more
author: 321freddy, Tireon/pmendl, NACH0
description:
Patch for Attach Notes, made for my modpack (https://mods.factorio.com/mod/nach0_modpack) but will also fix an issue when running this mod and space exploration and a few other mods, credit must go to the original mod creator 321freddy if you want me to take this down I will!, credit also to Tireon/pmendl as they made a patch i just made it a mod for easy download. Attach notes to combinators, entities... almost everything 
 + Adds signposts. 

All notes are saved when you export a blueprint as a string (but you need the mod to read them).
